^(provider_name)$.description:
The name of delta sharing provider.

 A Delta Sharing catalog is a catalog that is based on a Delta share on a remote sharing server.

^(share_name)$.description: The name of the share under the share provider.

^(storage_root)$.description: Storage root URL for managed tables within catalog.

properties.description: A map of key-value properties attached to the securable.

providerName.description:
The name of delta sharing provider.

 A Delta Sharing catalog is a catalog that is based on a Delta share on a remote sharing server.

shareName.description: The name of the share under the share provider.

storageRoot.description: Storage root URL for managed tables within catalog.
